facility_limitations: Very low repetition rate (1 shot/5 min)

hawking_specific: Radio detection system (20K system temp - better cooling)
Spectrum analyzers with high dynamic range

medium: Extended shot cycle impact on data collection

unique_opportunities: Magnetic field effects on horizon dynamics
Heavy ion effects on plasma formation

minimum_requirements: Sonic horizon detection with magnetic field effects
Data acquisition on > 90% of shots (lower shot count, higher quality)
target_achievements: Hawking-like spectrum detection with nuclear correlations
stretch_goals: Nuclear product correlation with Hawking signal
Comparison with theoretical predictions including nuclear effects

parameter_optimization.intensity_optimization: ELI-Beamlines and ELI-NP offer highest intensity capabilities
parameter_optimization.statistics_optimization: ELI-ALPS provides best statistical data collection
parameter_optimization.diagnostics_optimization: ELI-NP offers most comprehensive diagnostic suite
parameter_optimization.efficiency_optimization: ELI-ALPS provides most efficient data collection

best_use_cases.ELI-Beamlines: High-intensity single-shot experiments and proof-of-concept demonstrations
best_use_cases.ELI-NP: Advanced experiments with dual-beam configuration and enhanced diagnostics
best_use_cases.ELI-ALPS: High-statistics parameter space mapping and optimization studies

primary_facility.name: ELI-NP
primary_facility.rationale: Highest overall feasibility score and best match for experimental requirements

experimental_phases.rationale: High repetition rate for rapid parameter optimization
Maximum intensity for optimal signal strength

parameter_optimizations: Focus on intensity range 1e22-1e24 W/m² for optimal κ
Target plasma density 1e25-1e26 m⁻³ for horizon formation
Optimize density gradient scale 0.3-1.0 μm for strong gradients
Maintain flow velocity 0.2-0.4c for good horizon dynamics
risk_mitigation_strategies: Start with conservative parameters and gradually increase
Develop detailed plasma mirror timing protocols
Establish clear success criteria for each phase

physics_risks: Breakdown of fluid model assumptions at high intensity

actions: Contact recommended facilities for beam time inquiries
Complete detailed simulations with PIC codes
Schedule beam time at primary facility
